title: Elements of survival. Part 1. Populations
creator_credit: Doug Lower and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: First of a two-part series this episode focuses on the population spiral and looks at mankind from pre-history to the present explosion with its doubling of world population about every 35 years. The film looks at the possible consequences of unchecked growth, and the wide gulf between the haves and the have-nots.
